name: Crab Louie Salad
author: sonjagroset
summary: This is a variation of the classic salad. Get your hands on the freshest Dungeness crab possible. It takes a little time to put this salad together, but for an elegant lunch it really pays off!
ingredients: 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper, or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 head Bibb lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add asparagus and cook until tender, 2 to 3 minutes
Remove asparagus and and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Whisk mayonnaise, lemon juice, ketchup, relish, Worcestershire sauce, chili powder, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper together in a small bowl to make the dressing
Toss crabmeat, lettuce, cucumber, and celery together in a large bowl with dressing to taste
Pile salad mixture evenly onto 4 plates; add equal portions of asparagus, avocado, tomatoes, and eggs
